definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: usually lily, prob. any lily-like flower (Tristr:NHB 462 ff. Post:Hast. DB LILY Löw:No. 323; NH [[שׁוֹשַׁנׇּה]], Ar. sawsanun (Vulg. suwsanun), esp. iris, Aram. [[שׁוּשַׁנְתָּא]], 4uw4anto0 (PS:4344), Gk. sou=son Lewy:Fremdw. 48; orig. loan-word from Egypt. sššn, šôšĕ n, Erman:ZMG xlvi (1892), 117);—lily: in sim., [[יִפְרַח כַּשּׁוֹשַׁנׇּה]] Ho 14:7 (of Isr.), [[בֵּין הַחוֹחִים]] ´[[כְּשׁוֹ]]: Ct So 2:2 (sim. of bride), so cstr. [[שׁוֹשַׁנַּת הָעֲמָקִים]] v:So 2:1 (cf. [[חֲבַצֶּלֶת]]); pl. [[שׁוֹשַׁנִּים]] So 2:16, So 4:5, So 6:2, So 6:3, So 7:3 and (fig. of lover’s lips) So 5:13; of flower-shaped capitals of pillars, [[מַעֲשֵׂה שׁוּשַׁן]] 1Ki 7:19, [[שׁוֹשָָׁן]] ´[[מ]]: v:1Ki 7:22; cf. [[פֶּרַח שׁוֹשָָׁן]] of brim of molten sea v:1Ki 7:26, ‖[[שׁוֹשַׁנׇה ]] ´[[פ]]: 2Ch 4:5; elsewh. only Psalm-titles: [[עַ־שׁׂשַׁנִּים]] Ps 45:1, Ps 69:1, [[עַל־שׁוּשַׁן עֵדוּת]] Ps 60:1, [[אֶל־שׁשַׁגִּם]] [[עֵדוּת]] Ps 80:1; meaning not clear, v. Bae et Comm. al.; yet cf. [[עֵדוּת]], sub [[עוד]].
